#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int n,m;
int dp[101][101][101];
 
int f(int n1,int n2,int nb)
{
//dp[nb][n1][n2] denotes nb stones remaining on the table with n1 stones with player 1 and n2 stones player 2
 int &p=dp[nb][n1][n2];
 
 if(p!=-1) // if dp[nb][n1][n2] is already calculated then return
   return p;
   
 if(nb==0 && n1==0 && n2==0)
   {
   p=0;
   return p;
   }
 //he player that empties the box eats food from the collected gem stones while the other guy puts his stones back on the table and the game continues with the looser player starting
 if(nb==0)
  {
   p=f(0,0,n1);
   return p;
   }
   
 for(int i=1;i<=min(nb,m);i++)
   {
    p=max(p,n1+n2+nb-f(n2,n1+i,nb-i));
    //cout<<p<<endl;
    }
    
 return p;
 }
    
 
int main()
{
	
	cin>>n>>m;
	
	for(int i=0;i<=100;i++)
	  for(int j=0;j<=100;j++)
	    for(int k=0;k<101;k++)
	    dp[i][j][k]=-1;
	
	cout<<f(0,0,n)<<endl;
	
	return 0;
}
